name: Criminal America: San Diego
description:
Meet Bill Carlitto. After crime adventure in Vegas he go to California, San Diego city. Here Carlitto got in street full of crime and gang wars. Bill need find gun and car to make a lot of money.

This app includes:
- Crime simulator
- Beautiful America style landscape
- Thief car on streets with throwing driver out
- Banks and offices robbery
- Race in city and out
- Fights with fists and kick
- Many blows
- Moto, cars, helicopters
- Interesting rap hip hop music
- Fun animations
- Interesting car theft
- Elements of Shooter game
- Elements of Strategy game
- Secret missions with cheat code

Download Criminal America : San Diego for free and try to be the the criminal boss
